name: Fleeting Requests and the Spell Casting Crusaders
name_original: Fleeting Requests and the Spell Casting Crusaders
description:
Prologue and Chapter one of Fleeting Requests and the Spell Casting Crusaders.

Magic is an ability so rare that it might as well not exist. Why bring attention to yourself and use it openly? When Raymond is caught using magic, a strange group of people who call themselves the Spell Casting Crusaders recruit him into their group.

I work on this game myself as a hobby. I will update with Chapter Two: Farewell to My Friend when ready!

Controls 

  • Right clicking while a dialogue is playing allows you to skip over dialogue, dialogue skipped over using this method will not be recorded in the log.
  • Click on magic and items in your inventory to use them.
  • Right click while holding magic or an item to deselect.
  • Clicking an item in the inventory twice will cause an item description to play.
